ageGate.title: Age Verification
ageGate.description: Before you proceed, we need to confirm your age.
ageGate.legalNotice: According to Art. 8 GDPR in conjunction with ¬ß 25 para. 1 KDG, use of our app is only allowed for persons aged 16 and over.
ageGate.confirmAge: I confirm that I am at least 16 years old.
ageGate.confirmAgeDesc: This app is not intended for children and adolescents under 16 years of age.
ageGate.privacyConsequences:
‚Ä¢ Upon confirmation: Continue with registration
‚Ä¢ Without confirmation: No access to the app possible
‚Ä¢ No storage of personal data of under-16s
‚Ä¢ Immediate deletion if subsequently discovered
ageGate.contactNote: If you have questions about our privacy practices, please contact us.

withdrawal.title: Waiver of withdrawal for digital content
withdrawal.description: Before proceeding with your purchase, you must agree to the following legal notices.
withdrawal.importantNotice: For digital content (such as virtual hints), your 14-day right of withdrawal expires if the contract is performed with your consent before the end of the withdrawal period (¬ß 356 para. 5 BGB).
withdrawal.consent1: I agree that performance of the contract will begin before the end of the withdrawal period.
withdrawal.consent1Desc: Virtual items will be credited to your account immediately upon payment.
withdrawal.consent2: I understand that I thereby lose my right of withdrawal.
withdrawal.consent2Desc: After performance begins, there is no longer any right to a refund.
withdrawal.legalConsequences:
‚Ä¢ Virtual items will be available immediately after purchase
‚Ä¢ They cannot be returned afterwards
‚Ä¢ A refund is only possible in case of defects or legal exceptions
‚Ä¢ This consent is stored with version control ({version})

homeFeatures.smartLearningDesc: Adaptive quiz questions adjust to your knowledge level and focus on areas you want to strengthen.
homeFeatures.fiveMinutesDesc: Short, focused learning sessions fit perfectly into your work routine and help you learn continuously.
homeFeatures.certificatesDesc: Collect awards for your learning progress and share your achievements with colleagues.
homeFeatures.gdprCompliantDesc: Your data is safe and is only used for your learning progress. No advertising or data selling.

components.homeTagline: Developed by nursing professionals for nursing professionals - the perfect tool for your daily continuing education.
components.homeFooterTagline: Your daily companion for nursing knowledge and continuing education.
